name: Hero of Alexandria
description:
Learn actual Greek history with the most famous Greek engineer of all time, Hero of Alexandria. Discover his greatest inventions. Kill Romans.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys/WASD to move and jump

Space/X to shoot

Optionally use 1-4 keys (numpad works too) to switch weapons once you've unlocked them, although not sure why you'd want to.

OBJECTIVE:

Survive till T-0, that's all.
